name: Soulknife
description: Soulknives manifest psionic blades and harness psychic energy to enhance their agility and attacks.

3.name: Psychic Blades
3.description: You manifest psychic blades that deal psychic damage and can be used for Sneak Attack.

3.name: Psionic Power
3.description: You gain Psionic Energy dice to fuel special abilities.

9.name: Soul Blades
9.description: Your psychic blades gain additional properties, including teleportation and extended range.

13.name: Psychic Veil
13.description: You can become invisible for a limited time using psionic energy.

17.name: Rend Mind
17.description: You unleash psionic force to stun a creature you damage.
